markdownRemark.html:
As a person technology addict always learn a new thing is very important, there is a lot of changes made even nowadays. Just like Steve Jobs said

Stay Hungry & Stay Foolish

Be ready to try new things. Be ready to step out of your comfort zone. If you aren't hungry enough, you will never find the motivation to do anything in life.

Stay Motivated.. Cheers
